about_the_game:
"Maiden And Lord" is a relatively casual strategy war game that emphasizes player cooperation and the development of civilizations. It introduces innovative mechanisms such as "Private Territory" and "Safe Gathering," creating a prosperous and harmonious otherworldly realm.

-------

This is a strategy war game that breaks away from the endless conflicts between players in traditional strategy games! Instead, it focuses on cooperation and civilization development. The game seamlessly combines elements of strategy warfare, card-based hero development, simulation management, and team adventures. It also introduces groundbreaking city-building mechanics based on "Prosperity" and "Civilization" while implementing unique features like "Private Territory" and "Safe Gathering." Players can even dispatch caravans to transport goods across continents, fostering prosperity and harmonious growth together!

[Exclusive Territory, Safe Gathering]

In a crumbling otherworld, you take on the role of a lord who has crossed dimensions to restore the world and become a candidate for the throne. You will gain a private territory where you can collect resources, develop agriculture and industry without fear of interference from other players. Focus on building your own capital city and creating a peaceful, prosperous new world!

[Develop Civilization, Build a Homeland]

Say goodbye to the combat power-focused traditional model. This game takes "Civilization" and "Prosperity" as its core principles of development. By spreading civilization and fostering friendly cooperation, you can advance city development and make your nation flourish. The fire of civilization will illuminate every corner, forging a wealthy and harmonious new world.

[Wilderness Adventures, Mysterious Exploration]

In an otherworldly land full of unknowns and dangers, areas beyond the city walls are teeming with monsters and secrets waiting to be challenged. Defeating barbarians is essential! You will lead your team into the wilderness to challenge powerful monsters and unlock unique terrain zones such as deserts, forests, snowfields, and swamps. During exploration, you will discover rich treasures and rescue trapped soldiers.

[Wilderness Trials, Treasure Hunts]

The spirit of adventure never dies! The game introduces "Wilderness Map," "Ruins Dungeon," and "Divine Domon Trials" modes. As your city develops, you will unlock challenges of increasing difficulty. In Ruins Dungeon and Divine Trials, team up with friends to face unknown dangers, overcome countless challenges, and uncover lost treasures.

[Thrilling Competition, Peak Battles]

Participate in diverse competitive modes such as "Arena," "Ladder Tournament," and "Tournament," where you’ll engage in intense battles against lords from all over. Showcase your strategy and skill to claim championship glory and earn exclusive rewards!

[Hero Development, Missions Together]

With three major races and numerous heroes, each hero possesses unique skills and missions to help you defeat monsters and protect your homeland. Dispatch heroes to collect abundant rewards. They will be your most loyal companions on this otherworldly journey, assisting you in seizing the crown.

[Territory Conquest, Dominate the Continent]

Six regions and 36 cities await, each guarded by legendary lords. Players must utilize strategy and collaboration to gradually conquer cities, expand territories, and ultimately rise as the ruler of this otherworldly realm, crafting a legendary tale of their own!

content_descriptors.notes: Some heroes are wearing revealing clothes or are naked
